external_games.name: The Grip Games PS Vita Collection

name: The Grip Games PS Vita Collection
storyline:
Jet Car Stunts:
Drive a Jet Car, a hybrid between a race car and a jet, and race your way through the most devious tracks full of jumps, loops, free falls, and sharp turns. Use your jet engine to perform mile-long jumps, find shortcuts and new paths, and challenge the best racers around the world!

Atomic Ninjas:
Outsmart and outflank other players, upgrade your Super Abilities and use crazy ninja weapons and gadgets. Only the most malicious players win!

Foosball 2012:
Play multiplayer matches, dominate the online leaderboards, or become a global champion in the single-player World Tour mode.
summary: The Grip Games PS Vita Collection gives you three games in a bundle: Jet Car Stunts, Atomic Ninjas and Foosball 2012.
